Naming/VariableNumber.description:
Description

Use the configured style when numbering symbols, methods and variables.
Naming/VariableNumber.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: normalcase (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['snake_case', 'normalcase', 'non_integer'] (type: list)
CheckMethodNames: True (type: bool)
CheckSymbols: True (type: bool)
AllowedIdentifiers: ['TLS1_1', 'TLS1_2', 'capture3', 'iso8601', 'rfc1123_date', 'rfc822', 'rfc2822', 'rfc3339', 'x86_64'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
